name: Pyrofang
description: A fierce, wolf-like monster with flames erupting from its fur. Its eyes glow red, and it leaves a trail of embers wherever it goes.

name: Aquaflare
description: A rare hybrid monster that blends the power of water and fire. Its body shimmers with a mix of blue and orange flames.

name: Thornroot
description: A plant-based monster resembling a walking tree, with vines that lash out at enemies. Its bark-covered body provides strong defense.

name: Shadowclaw
description: A stealthy, panther-like monster that can blend into the shadows. Its piercing green eyes can paralyze foes with fear.

name: Crystalis
description: A majestic, crystalline monster with shimmering wings made of ice. It can create powerful ice storms to freeze its enemies.

name: Boulderox
description: A massive, ox-like monster with a body made of solid rock. It’s incredibly strong and difficult to bring down.

name: Venomtail
description: A scorpion-like monster with a deadly stinger. It’s capable of injecting powerful venom into its foes, weakening them over time.

name: Solaris
description: A radiant, lion-like monster that embodies the power of the sun. It can blind its enemies with intense light and heal its allies.
